name: SleepNoiseRainOnATinRoof
0:
”Alexa, open sleep noise rain on a tin roof”
”Alexa, start sleep noise rain on a tin roof”
”Alexa, launch sleep noise rain on a tin roof”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep noise rain on a tin roof
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Noise Rain On A Tin Roof lets you reproduce relaxing raining audio tracks that will make you feel like it's raining on top of your head. This skill will relax you and make you study more.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram! Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
